title: client is crashing or say csync update failed.
body: hi ! i'm trying to sync approx 160gb of data biggest file approx 4gb. tried since v4.0.x my client is 1.1.2 on windows vista laptop. serveur on ubuntu 64b v4.5.2 never sync entirely my laptop client is crashing or say csync update failed. i made some chage of php.conf while looking http://owncloud.org/support/big-files/ my local db on laptop is always 0 byte. some extract of log files : client 11-27 21:09:45:430 csync.vio.main - win32: stat-inode for d:\pour tout le monde/mes images/2004/2004-09-19 50 ans de jean-franã§ois/50 ans jf/105canon/img_0584.jpg: 33557 11-27 21:09:45:431 csync.statedb - sqlite3_compile error: no such table: metadata - on query select md5 from metadata where phash='4457505606980850650' and modtime=1095600076 11-27 21:09:45:431 csync.updater - uniq id read from database: mes images/2004/2004-09-19 50 ans de jean-franã§ois/50 ans jf/105canon/img_0584.jpg -> 11-27 21:09:45:431 csync.updater -
